name: Şahin Drift: Online
description:
The legendary falcon is in your hands!

Forget all the hawk drifting games you're playing.
Sahin dirft is waiting for you to drift with real opponents.
Wide range of modifications:

-Large color options
-Real competitors
-Optimized wheels
-12 different spoilers
-Buffers designed for the hawk

and start racing with different modifiying options!

Tell us your opinions and comments!
